definition: Lin Chi-ling (1974-), Taiwanese model and actress
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
(onom.) ting-a-ling (in compounds such as 玎玲 or 玲瓏|玲珑)/tinkling of gem-pendants

sentences.english: Lin made her movie debut in the first part of this historical epic.
sentences.chinese: 林志玲是在这部历史大片的第一部分首次“触电”。

sentences.english: Tseng, 34, used to be Chiling Lin and Jolin Tsai's dancing teacher.
sentences.chinese: 34岁的曾馨莹曾任林志玲和蔡依林的舞蹈老师。

sentences.english: There is no denying that Lin Zhiling is the most charming actress I have ever seen.
sentences.chinese: 不可否定，林志玲是我所见过的最有魅力的女演员。

sentences.english: There is no denying that Lin Zhiling is the most charming actress I have ever seen。
sentences.chinese: 不可否认，林志玲是我所见过的最有魅力的女演员。

sentences.english: Chiling is a drunbee, but my father likes her, which is disgusting.
sentences.chinese: 林志玲是个装逼的人，但是我爸爸喜欢她，真恶心。

definition: Ruby Lin (1976-), Taiwanese actress and pop singer
Li Bingbing (1973-), PRC film actress and pop star
Joey Yung (1980-), Hong Kong pop singer and actress
Cecilia Cheung (1980-), Hong Kong actress and pop singer
Michele Monique Reis (1970-) actress, model and former Miss Hong Kong & Miss Chinese International
Coco Lee (1975-), pop singer, songwriter and actress
Gong Li (1965-), PRC female film star
